site_name: Site Between Varden Street And Ashfield Street (Whitechapel Estate), London, E1
description: Proposal: PA/20/01743/A1 - Request for observations from London Borough of Tower Hamlets for: "Demolition of all existing buildings and redevelopment to provide 12 buildings ranging from ground plus 2-23 storeys, comprising residential dwellings (Class C3), specialist accommodation units (Class C2), office floorspace (Class B1), flexible office and non-residential institution floorspace (Class B1/D1), retail floorspace (Class A1-A3), car parking, cycle parking, hard and soft landscaping and other associated works.   Minor Material Amendments to planning permission ref: APP/E5900/W/17/3171437 of planning permission ref: PA/15/02959, Dated 21/02/2018, as amended by planning permission ref: PA/20/00370, Dated 26/03/2020.   Amendments include: Increase in residential units from 343 to 370; Decrease in specialist units from 168 to 159; Decrease in non-residential floorspace from 3,685sqm to 3,170sqm; Minor massing changes to Blocks B1/B2, C, D1, D2, E, G, Ha and I; Minor public realm amendments to accommodate above changes, including realigned paths and re-designed landscaping; Reduced basement footprint in the eastern half of the site, resulting in decrease in basement parking, removal of auditorium, removal of residents' amenities, reorganisation of refuse rooms and relocation of residents' cycle storage to the ground floor; and Relocated Energy Centre from basement of Blocks B1/B2 to the basement of Block D1."
